This class is used by TaskManagerTP wrap tasks into objects that can be enqueued and assigned to a thread. More...

Detailed Description

This class is used by TaskManagerTP wrap tasks into objects that can be enqueued and assigned to a thread.

See also:
TaskManagerTP

This type represents the state of the WorkItem.

virtual void WorkItem::Process ( void   )  [pure virtual]

This abstract method will be called from a thread in the thread pool managed by TaskManagerTP.

Implemented in SystemTaskWrapper, and SystemParallelForWrapper.
